item.title: YOLO-ing All the Traffic Cams
item.description: TL;DR - Here’s a web app to list labelled traffic cam images from the RI DOT website. I used YOLO (You Only Look Once) to detect objects (vehicles) in the images and FastAPI to serve the results to a React app. The app uses LeafletJS to display the images and the results. The backend is hosted on Railway and the front end on Github Pages. The code is available on GitHub.
